{|class="infobox bordered" style="float:right; width:264px; font-size:90%; text-align:left; border:2px solid #4d4494; padding:3px;" cellpadding="3" |- !colspan="2" style="font-size:110%; text-align:center; background-color:#{{Evolution items color dark}}; color:#FFF;" | {{{name}}} |- {{#if:{{{image|}}} | {{!}} colspan="2" style="text-align:center;" {{!}}{{{image}}}{{#if:{{{symbol|}}}|
{{{symbol}}}}}{{#if:{{{caption|}}}|
